attributes.action: resign immediately since you no longer have the confidence of the British people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British people believe that you are indecisive, uncaring and have your own agenda. Laid at your door are unacceptable decisions by you on the economy, income tax, Europe, devolution, increase in public sector employees of 800,000, persecution of motorists, an attitude to "green" of revenue collection rather than solution, provision of energy in the UK, security of Britain, restoration of social values, immigration, and an effective National Health Service

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
